You are experiencing the following symptoms:

- Disorganized behavior, talking rapidly and jumping between topics without clear connection

I feel paranoid and on edge all the time now, like I can't trust anyone, and I keep talking to myself or acting out in ways that don’t make sense. I’m really scared because I don’t know what’s happening to me or how to make it stop.
